List MintModels

List all MintModels for an asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "cc3835eb-9271-4121-bb51-b2dfc1616c7a",
      • "type": "mintmodel",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "complex": {
            • "json": {
              • "mintmodel": "data"
              }
            }
          },
        • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:33.514795Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:33.514795Z",
        • "render_logs": "MintPress renderer output"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "mintmodel_history": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "340125cf-e20f-42c2-a3fb-4b89630e399c",
              • "type": "mintmodel_history"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/cc3835eb-9271-4121-bb51-b2dfc1616c7a",
        • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Show MintModel

Shows an asset MintModel.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

mintmodel_id
required
string
Example: cd65db97-4eed-4891-8c9e-910585084773

MintModel id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels/{mintmodel_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "cfeba185-2a5b-473d-a3c8-27a59ebd0e48",
    • "type": "mintmodel",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "complex": {
          • "json": {
            • "mintmodel": "data"
            }
          }
        },
      • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:33.976412Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:33.976412Z",
      • "render_logs": "MintPress renderer output"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "mintmodel_history": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "71f1b521-f9c7-4a66-bf5f-79b82c8739a1",
            • "type": "mintmodel_history"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/cfeba185-2a5b-473d-a3c8-27a59ebd0e48",
      • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
      }
    }
}

Generate MintModel

Generate the MintModel for this asset, using the latest properties and template version.

Note: The endpoint does not store the MintModel, rather it provides a point in time reference for the MintModel content that will be used by a change if one is executed for the asset.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

asset_code
required
string
Example: prj_soa

asset code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/mintmodels/generate

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "a74c9b90-0698-4d2c-962b-49eaf380a614",
    • "type": "mintmodel",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "complex": {
          • "json": {
            • "mintmodel": "data"
            }
          }
        },
      • "sha256": "77526a9ef926aee8c98f90ec845f5bd12f58cd7afb29fb2db5ef8f95deec44f8",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:34.705775Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:34.705775Z",
      • "render_logs": "MintPress renderer output"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "mintmodel_history": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "e3601ca9-785b-458b-95e6-35b488561538",
            • "type": "mintmodel_history"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodels/a74c9b90-0698-4d2c-962b-49eaf380a614",
      • "parent_mintmodel_history": "/api/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa/mintmodel_history"
      }
    }
}

Workflows

Endpoints to interact with enterprise project workflows

List workflows

Lists all workflows for a project.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows

Response samples

  • 200
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "d2b3169d-2402-41db-9b8f-29dba308bb45",
      • "type": "workflow",
      • "attributes": {
        • "code": "assets",
        • "name": "assets workflow",
        • "description": "workflow for assets",
        • "draft": false,
        • "archived": false,
        • "created_by": "lesley",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:27.393875Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:27.393875Z",
        • "source_yaml": "---\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",
        • "steps": [
          • {
            • "name": "run asset action",
            • "type": "change",
            • "action": "run",
            • "target": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
            }
          ],
        • "resolved_steps": [ ],
        • "sample_properties": {
          • "sample": "value"
          },
        • "latest_version": 2,
        • "notifications": { },
        • "latest_published_version": 2
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "versions": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "7d586fe3-d89c-43b5-a507-67187d31c944",
              • "type": "workflow_version"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "97045d0a-3851-429a-83f5-7e5be40c24ce",
              • "type": "workflow_version"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets",
        • "runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs",
        • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "versions": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions",
        • "latest_version": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/2",
        • "latest_published_version": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/2"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Create workflow

Create a workflow

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "t24jb",
      • "archived": false,
      • "name": "gpmmyocqrw",
      • "description": "I'll back up the 1080p PCI interface, that should card the AGP array!",
      • "notifications": { },
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "targets": [
            • "/projects/oepbl/environments/fvjve/assets/tjqyo",
            • "/projects/ln409/environments/qwrtk/assets/zwhrh"
            ],
          • "action": "compress",
          • "template_versions": [
            • "tlb5h",
            • "cvaru"
            ],
          • "run_as": "sequential",
          • "name": "nobis"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "wait",
          • "requires_approval_from": null,
          • "name": "sint"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "workflow",
          • "target": "/projects/wfnft/workflows/xdfzd",
          • "version": 1,
          • "name": "laborum",
          • "start_time": null
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "qui",
          • "children": [

              • "type": "change",

Update workflow

Update a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "archived": false,
      • "name": "ifhpnjxytz",
      • "description": "If we quantify the bus, we can get to the PCI protocol through the optical HDD card!",

        • {
          • "type": "change",

      }
    }
}

Delete workflow

Delete or archive a workflow.

  • If the workflow has not been run before, it will be deleted.
  • If the workflow has been run before, it will be archived and all draft and unused versions will be deleted..
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find Workflow with [WHERE (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) AND \"workflows\".\"node_id\" = $1 AND \"workflows\".\"code\" = $2]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Workflow versions

required
string

workflow_code
required
string

workflow code

  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Delete draft workflow versions

Deletes all draft versions of a workflow.

Note: At least one version will remain. If all versions are drafts, the latest draft version will be kept.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions

Response samples

  • 206
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "e5ae568f-aa17-4456-abf4-c5f8aa236795",
    • "type": "workflow",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "assets",
      • "name": "assets workflow",
      • "description": "workflow for assets",
      • "draft": false,
      • "archived": false,
      • "created_by": "odell_doyle",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:22.204016Z",

        • {
          • "name": "run asset action",
          • "type": "change",

Show workflow version

Shows a workflow version.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

version
required
string
Example: 2

version

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions/{version}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "46835c1c-9bfc-42da-841e-02687d831194",
    • "type": "workflow_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "assets",
      • "name": "assets workflow",
      • "description": "workflow for assets",
      • "draft": false,
      • "archived": false,
      • "created_by": "otto.hoppe",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:23.245602Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:23.245602Z",
      • "source_yaml": "---\nsteps:\n- type: change\n name: run asset action\n target: \"/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa\"\n action: run\n",
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "name": "run asset action",
          • "type": "change",
          • "action": "run",
          • "target": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa"
          }
        ],
      • "resolved_steps": [ ],
      • "sample_properties": {
        • "sample": "value"
        },
      • "version": 2
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/2",
      • "runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/versions/2/runs",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "workflow": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets"
      }
    }
}

Update workflow

Update a workflow version.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

version
required
string
Example: 2

version

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions/{version}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "1zau1",
      • "node_id": "0892ffee-325f-4e49-be6e-683ac79f43cc",
      • "archived": false,
      • "name": "xkrqb1hnr3",
      • "description": "Calculating the firewall won't do anything, we need to parse the multi-byte rss array!",
      • "notifications": { },
      • "steps": [
        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "targets": [
            • "/projects/oepbl/environments/fvjve/assets/tjqyo",
            • "/projects/ln409/environments/qwrtk/assets/zwhrh"
            ],
          • "action": "compress",
          • "template_versions": [
            • "tlb5h",
            • "cvaru"
            ],
          • "run_as": "sequential",
          • "name": "nobis"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "wait",
          • "requires_approval_from": null,
          • "name": "sint"
          },
        • {
          • "type": "workflow",
          • "target": "/projects/wfnft/workflows/xdfzd",
          • "version": 1,
          • "name": "laborum",
          • "start_time": null
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "parallel",
          • "name": "qui",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/66wqq/environments/fv3sk/assets/hlabp",
              • "action": "index",
              • "template_version": "r0dix",
              • "name": "voluptas",
              • "start_time": "2025-11-04T07:10:55Z"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",
              • "requires_approval_from": "nihil",
              • "name": "laudantium"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/ykqiw/workflows/aooar",
              • "version": 1,
              • "name": "veniam",
              • "start_time": "2025-11-04T07:10:55Z"
              }
            ]
          },
        • {
          • "run_as": "sequential",
          • "name": "omnis",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "type": "change",
              • "target": "/projects/tlvba/environments/49qgb/assets/punpr",
              • "action": "transmit",
              • "template_version": "u99ma",
              • "name": "ab",
              • "start_time": null
              },
            • {
              • "type": "wait",
              • "requires_approval_from": "et",
              • "name": "fugiat"
              },
            • {
              • "type": "workflow",
              • "target": "/projects/z6vxg/workflows/k3jju",
              • "version": 1,
              • "name": "nesciunt",
              • "start_time": null
              }
            ]
          }
        ],
      • "draft": true
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "6cd8647b-3916-4f7e-82e1-1b24ad771c56",
    • "type": "workflow_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "assets",
      • "name": "new workflow name",
      • "description": "new description",
      • "draft": true,
      • "archived": false,
      • "created_by": "taylor_crona",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:24.976188Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:25.023818Z",

        • {
          • "type": "change",
          • "targets": [
            • "/projects/oepbl/environments/fvjve/assets/tjqyo",

            • "tlb5h",

      • "workflow": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets"
      }
    }
}

Delete workflow version

Delete or archive a workflow version.

  • If the workflow version has not been run before, it will be deleted.
  • If the workflow version has been run before, it will be archived.
path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

version
required
string
Example: 2

version

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/versions/{version}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find WorkflowVersion with [WHERE \"workflow_versions\".\"workflow_id\" = $1 AND \"workflow_versions\".\"version\" = $2]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Properties

Endpoints to interact with properties.

Show properties

Shows the current properties JSON and its version.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: 6b4c24c7-a199-4386-a444-1d22f5264c10

properties id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "17f4f2e8-d59a-4496-a1b8-a99610a67b78",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:47.361071Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/17f4f2e8-d59a-4496-a1b8-a99610a67b78",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/17f4f2e8-d59a-4496-a1b8-a99610a67b78/versions/1",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/17f4f2e8-d59a-4496-a1b8-a99610a67b78/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update properties

Updates a properties JSON if the included version matches the current properties version.

path Parameters
id_to_update
required
string
Example: 6b4c24c7-a199-4386-a444-1d22f5264c10

properties id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "6d230a4f-ba97-41ae-b5d2-6e9373b2b249",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:47.686917Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/6d230a4f-ba97-41ae-b5d2-6e9373b2b249",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/6d230a4f-ba97-41ae-b5d2-6e9373b2b249/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/6d230a4f-ba97-41ae-b5d2-6e9373b2b249/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update properties (unsafe)

Updates a properties JSON, without any version checking (always updates).

path Parameters
id_to_set
required
string
Example: 6b4c24c7-a199-4386-a444-1d22f5264c10

properties id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{id_to_set}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "18eb127c-1827-4f37-9a11-f8cfdff4caf7",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with updated value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:48.427032Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/18eb127c-1827-4f37-9a11-f8cfdff4caf7",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/18eb127c-1827-4f37-9a11-f8cfdff4caf7/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/18eb127c-1827-4f37-9a11-f8cfdff4caf7/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update file property

Update a file property in the project, environment or asset properties.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

Request Body schema: multipart/form-data
file_path
string (Path to write the file within /opt/opschain)
mode
string (Linux octal file mode)
format
string (Valid values are 'raw' (default), 'json' or 'base64')
replace_file
string (Replace the file property if it exists (default: false))
secret_path
string (Path to write the secret key into)
secret_key
string
replace_secret
string (Replace the secret vault value if it exists (default: false))
file
string <binary>

File to use. The filename is ignored.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/file_properties/

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
multipart/form-data
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="mode"

0600
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="file_path"

/opt/opschain/sample.txt
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="format"

raw
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="replace_file"

true
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="sample.txt"
content-type: text/plain
content-length: 21

Sample file property

------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1--

Response samples

  • 201
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "aeaebed1-0919-45d1-8a45-fe946ec4e8ff",
    • "type": "properties",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          },
        • "opschain": {
          • "files": {
            • "/opt/opschain/sample.txt": {
              • "mode": "0600",
              • "format": "raw",
              • "content": "Sample file property\n"
              }
            }
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:48.944316Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/properties/aeaebed1-0919-45d1-8a45-fe946ec4e8ff",
      • "current_version": "/api/properties/aeaebed1-0919-45d1-8a45-fe946ec4e8ff/versions/2",
      • "versions": "/api/properties/aeaebed1-0919-45d1-8a45-fe946ec4e8ff/versions"
      }
    }
}

Properties versions

Endpoints to interact with the version history for properties.

List properties versions

Lists all versions of an OpsChain properties.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: 6b4c24c7-a199-4386-a444-1d22f5264c10

properties id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}/versions

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "06c8e6cf-f570-40ca-b5a1-27ed61c374dd",
      • "type": "properties_version",
      • "attributes": {
        • "data": {
          • "any_key": "with a value",
          • "another_key": "with a different value",
          • "nested": {
            • "key": "nested value"
            }
          },
        • "version": 1,
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:49.141813Z",
        • "owner_type": "Project"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "4e83e29f-161b-4eb5-9629-558a75dbf407",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/4e83e29f-161b-4eb5-9629-558a75dbf407"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "versions": "/api/properties/4e83e29f-161b-4eb5-9629-558a75dbf407/versions",
        • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
        • "self": "/api/properties/4e83e29f-161b-4eb5-9629-558a75dbf407/versions/1"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      }
    ]
}

Show properties version

Shows the properties JSON for this properties version.

path Parameters
properties_id
required
string
Example: 6b4c24c7-a199-4386-a444-1d22f5264c10

properties id

version_number
required
integer
Example: 1

version number

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/properties/{properties_id}/versions/{version_number}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "975ac53f-f300-43ce-b5d9-4645abd14a0c",
    • "type": "properties_version",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          }
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:49.547930Z",
      • "owner_type": "Project"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "2f16f3d0-e74f-4460-b17e-cd588ded29ef",
          • "type": "properties"
          },
        • "links": {
          • "related": "/api/properties/2f16f3d0-e74f-4460-b17e-cd588ded29ef"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "versions": "/api/properties/2f16f3d0-e74f-4460-b17e-cd588ded29ef/versions",
      • "owner": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "self": "/api/properties/2f16f3d0-e74f-4460-b17e-cd588ded29ef/versions/1"
      },
    • "meta": { }
    }
}

Changes

Endpoints to interact with changes.

List changes

Lists all changes.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[environment_code_eq]=dev

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=changes.csv

Download changes in CSV format with the specified file name. The changes will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

include
string
Example: include=steps,parents

Include the change steps and parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "6dafea61-8506-4557-ad8c-318a9b0ea803",
      • "type": "change",
      • "attributes": {
        • "created_by": "brendan",
        • "name": "override",
        • "action": "override",
        • "build_without_cache": false,
        • "initial_step_tree": { },
        • "metadata": {
          • "microchip": "compressing"
          },
        • "property_overrides": {
          • "protocol": "calculating"
          },
        • "scheduled": false,
        • "approved_by": [ ],
        • "rejected_by": [ ],
        • "cancelled_by": null,
        • "status_code": "success",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:18.003031Z",
        • "started_at": "2025-11-03T07:04:22.669042Z",
        • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:09:57.108701Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:18.014168Z",
        • "asset_name": null,
        • "environment_name": "Development",
        • "project_name": "OpsChain",
        • "git_remote_name": "github",
        • "git_rev": "main",
        • "commit_sha": "072a4bfb58dd7b08bc65afc26b495efa0f5cd033",
        • "requires_approval_from": null
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "7300809d-a3e9-4566-aa3e-cf94cfcc0c33",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/7300809d-a3e9-4566-aa3e-cf94cfcc0c33"
            }
          },
        • "parents": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "15535424-597d-4aeb-bdba-e9b032ecc43e",
              • "type": "project"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "19993cf2-96ca-4e0b-ae65-43a5afb29b93",
              • "type": "environment"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "root_step": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "8c0f1339-f203-4933-93ff-fdbc3e1ca5c0",
            • "type": "step"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/steps/8c0f1339-f203-4933-93ff-fdbc3e1ca5c0"
            }
          },
        • "steps": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "8c0f1339-f203-4933-93ff-fdbc3e1ca5c0",
              • "type": "step"
              }
            ]
          },
        • "workflow_run": {

}

Create change

Creates a change in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When creating changes via a project, environment or asset changes path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/changes) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.
  2. When creating changes for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/changes) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.
Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "metadata": {
        • "feed": "generating"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "microchip": "compressing"
        },
      • "scheduled_activity_id": null,
      • "build_without_cache": false,
      • "pod_per_step": true,
      • "action_path": null,
      • "action": "back_up",
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev/assets/env_soa",
      • "template_version": "2023_Q4_2"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "e9ac468c-86b8-4796-b54c-70539d45e767",
    • "type": "change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "erna",

        },
      • "meta": { }
      }
    ]
}

Show change

Shows a change, including it's parent nodes.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: 03911d3c-a2d4-4e41-9b3f-714f322531f7

change id

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=steps,parents

Include the change steps and parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "730d2828-0be1-425c-ade5-80a29cd78b05",

        • "workflows": "/api/projects/opc/workflows",
        • "workflow_runs": "/api/projects/opc/workflow_runs",
        • "templates": "/api/projects/opc/templates",
        • "environments": "/api/projects/opc/environments",
        • "assets": "/api/projects/opc/assets"
        },
      • "meta": {
        • "can_have_changes": true,
        • "can_have_children": true,
        • "can_have_properties": true,
        • "can_have_settings": true,
        • "can_have_templates": true,
        • "requires_template": false,

          • "environment",
          • "asset"

Cancel change

Cancels a change.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: 03911d3c-a2d4-4e41-9b3f-714f322531f7

change id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find Change with [WHERE \"changes\".\"node_id\" IN (WITH \"user_authorisation_rules\" AS (select ar.path rule_path, ap.system, pa.username, pa.auth_provider, pa.groupname, bool_and(ar.readable) as readable, bool_and(ar.updatable) as updatable, bool_and(ar.executable) as executable from authorisation_rules ar inner join policy_rules pr on pr.authorisation_rule_id = ar.id inner join authorisation_policies ap on pr.authorisation_policy_id = ap.id inner join policy_assignments pa on pa.authorisation_policy_id = ap.id where ( (pa.username is null and pa.groupname is null) or (pa.username = 'bryce.lindgren') or (pa.groupname in ('ldap-group-1','ldap-group-2')) ) group by ar.path, ap.system, pa.username, pa.auth_provider, pa.groupname), \"matching_nodes\" AS (select n.id, n.path node_path, n.parent_id, n.node_type, n.code, n.name, n.path, n.project_type, n.template_version_id, bool_and(ur.readable) over (partition by n.path, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as readable, bool_and(ur.updatable) over (partition by n.path, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as updatable, bool_and(ur.executable) over (partition by n.path, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as executable, rank() over (partition by n.path order by ur.system desc, length(ur.rule_path) desc, ur.username nulls last, ur.groupname nulls last rows between unbounded preceding and unbounded following) ranking, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path from nodes n inner join user_authorisation_rules ur on ( (n.path || '/') ~ (ur.rule_path || '($|/)') )), \"matching_indirect\" AS (select n.id, n.path node_path, n.parent_id, n.node_type, n.code, n.name, n.path, n.project_type, n.template_version_id, bool_and(ur.readable) over (partition by n.path, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as readable, false as updatable, false as executable, rank() over (partition by n.path order by ur.system desc, length(ur.rule_path) desc, ur.username nulls last, ur.groupname nulls last rows between unbounded preceding and unbounded following) ranking, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path from nodes n inner join user_authorisation_rules ur on ( ur.rule_path like '%/authorisation_policies' and ( (n.path || '/') ~ (substring(ur.rule_path from '(^.*)/authorisation_policies') || '($|/)') or (n.path || '/') ~ (substring(ur.rule_path from 0 for (length(n.path) + 2)) || '($|/)') ) ) or (n.path || '/') ~ (substring(ur.rule_path from 0 for (length(n.path) + 2)) || '($|/)')), \"resolved_authorisations\" AS (select mn.id node_id, mn.parent_id, mn.node_type, mn.code, mn.name, mn.path, mn.project_type, mn.template_version_id, mn.readable, mn.updatable, mn.executable, mn.rule_path from matching_nodes mn where mn.ranking = 1 union select mi.id node_id, mi.parent_id, mi.node_type, mi.code, mi.name, mi.path, mi.project_type, mi.template_version_id, mi.readable, mi.updatable, mi.executable, mi.rule_path from matching_indirect mi where mi.ranking = 1) SELECT \"nodes\".\"id\" FROM \"nodes\" WHERE (nodes.id in (select an.node_id from resolved_authorisations an where an.readable = true)) ORDER BY \"nodes\".\"name\" ASC) AND (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) AND \"changes\".\"id\" = $1]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Scheduled activities

List activities

Lists all scheduled activities.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[project_code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

include
string
Example: include=parents

Include the scheduled change parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

}

Create activities

Creates a scheduled activity in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When creating scheduled activities via a project, environment or asset scheduled_activities path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/scheduled_activities) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.

  2. When creating scheduled activities for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/scheduled_activities) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.

  3. See the various payload examples to understand the required fields for each possible request to this endpoint.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "git_rev": "master",
      • "action": "install_os",
      • "cron_schedule": "37 17 20 7 3",
      • "new_commits_only": true,
      • "repeat": true,
      • "metadata": {
        • "alarm": "hacking"
        },
      • "run_at": null,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "transmitter": "parsing"
        },
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "d82d80d1-1630-48f0-bf9c-92c540e2289d",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "kraig.sporer",
      • "cron_schedule": "52 11 19 7 *",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "enabled": true,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "sensor": "backing up"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "monitor": "transmitting"
        },
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:08.522023Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:08.522023Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-07-19T01:52:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "action": "different_action",
      • "new_commits_only": true,
      • "git_rev": "primary",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "asset_code": null,
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_code": "dev",
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "c88ec41a-cc97-4cb6-80e7-4a2c20353ea4",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "d5e38cfa-20ac-4f28-9bb5-e795e76c7bdb",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "git_remote": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/4eae3c6c-554b-45f7-ab9d-d6ae61960571",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "self": "/api/scheduled_activities/d82d80d1-1630-48f0-bf9c-92c540e2289d"
      }
    }
}

Show activity

Shows a scheduled activity.

path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: 99fa5e0a-108c-40fe-b609-79f23dfacbe2

scheduled change id

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=parents

Include the scheduled change parents in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "ce46a29b-ec13-44e7-8e60-fd114288c264",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "janessa_larson",
      • "cron_schedule": "0 10 15 5 3",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "enabled": true,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "transmitter": "quantifying"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "hard drive": "copying"
        },
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:09.409303Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:09.409303Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-05-06T00:00:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "action": "parse",
      • "new_commits_only": false,
      • "git_rev": "virtual",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "asset_code": null,
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_code": "dev",
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "69d677d9-180a-4cd5-84c0-d504c362c7a7",
            • "type": "project"

          • {
            • "id": "8b11d48a-e41f-4613-ae3f-571f53315919",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        }
      },

      • "git_remote": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/13287f56-33db-4c9d-a7aa-22a40bb98294",

      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",

            • "execute": true

            }
          }
        }
      }
    ]
}

Update activity

Updates a scheduled activity in a specific project, environment or asset.

Notes:

  1. When updating activities via a project, environment or asset scheduled_activities path (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/scheduled_activities) the parent_path request attributes must not be supplied as the parent will be derived from the path.
  2. When updating activities for assets (e.g. POST to /api/projects/{project_code}/assets/{asset_code}/scheduled_activities) the git_remote_name and git_rev attributes must not be supplied as the Git remote and revision will be derived from the asset's template.
  3. See the various payload examples to understand the attributes you can supply to this endpoint.
  4. The payload need only consist of the attributes you wish to modify. There is no need to supply the entire scheduled activity.
path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: 99fa5e0a-108c-40fe-b609-79f23dfacbe2

scheduled change id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "git_rev": "master",
      • "action": "install_os",
      • "cron_schedule": "57 7 9 9 3",
      • "new_commits_only": false,
      • "repeat": true,
      • "metadata": {
        • "feed": "parsing"
        },
      • "run_at": null,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "microchip": "connecting"
        },
      • "parent_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "e8b3ab06-0391-4eb0-9ff8-dd5c286d1a32",
    • "type": "scheduled_change",
    • "attributes": {
      • "created_by": "loyce",
      • "cron_schedule": "34 20 14 1 0",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "maximum_run_count": 5,
      • "enabled": true,
      • "allow_parallel_execution": false,
      • "metadata": {
        • "alarm": "programming"
        },
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "new": "property",
        • "value": "overrides"
        },
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:11.075988Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:11.524047Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-01-04T09:34:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "action": "new_action",
      • "new_commits_only": true,
      • "git_rev": "cross-platform",
      • "project_name": "OpsChain",
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "asset_code": null,
      • "asset_name": null,
      • "environment_code": "dev",
      • "environment_name": "Development",
      • "git_remote_name": "github"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "parents": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "9d066a0d-b5ef-49d0-8b24-9e83c1969430",
            • "type": "project"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "14a5a734-9f77-4b60-8b08-4025695cc7c3",
            • "type": "environment"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "git_remote": "/api/projects/opc/git_remotes/c496ad16-f8cf-4da5-b168-94bd7ede0db7",
      • "project": "/api/projects/opc",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "self": "/api/scheduled_activities/e8b3ab06-0391-4eb0-9ff8-dd5c286d1a32"
      }
    }
}

Delete activity

Delete a scheduled activity.

path Parameters
scheduled_change_id
required
string
Example: 99fa5e0a-108c-40fe-b609-79f23dfacbe2

scheduled change id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/scheduled_activities/{scheduled_change_id}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find BaseScheduledActivity with [WHERE (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) AND \"scheduled_activities\".\"id\" = $1]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Steps

Endpoints to interact with change steps.

List steps

Lists all steps.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[action_eq]=provision

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "98508e91-b9eb-4a35-bfdf-07fdb355e502",
      • "type": "step",
      • "attributes": {
        • "approved_by": [ ],
        • "rejected_by": [ ],
        • "continued_by": [ ],
        • "requires_approval_from": null,
        • "action": "connect",
        • "name": "connect",
        • "step_type": "standard",
        • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential",
        • "change_id": "1978e9af-f1cc-4923-9157-20ad2d3af85c",
        • "skip_on_retry": false,
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:03:23.954931Z",
        • "started_at": "2025-11-03T07:04:23.954931Z",
        • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:05:19.426900Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:54.911131Z",
        • "status_code": "success"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "properties": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "a172b1a7-ab61-43ad-b5c3-2140e78c23b8",
            • "type": "properties"
            },
          • "links": {
            • "related": "/api/properties/a172b1a7-ab61-43ad-b5c3-2140e78c23b8"
            }
          },
        • "children": {
          • "data": [ ]
          },
        • "change": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "1978e9af-f1cc-4923-9157-20ad2d3af85c",
            • "type": "change"
            }
          },
        • "properties_versions": {
          • "data": [
            • {
              • "id": "ad5bb8cd-cbe0-46ad-89d7-9dac75bd619b",
              • "type": "properties_version"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "2e23d858-6d86-44a7-af67-f79dfa702c0e",
              • "type": "properties_version"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "parent": "/api/changes/1978e9af-f1cc-4923-9157-20ad2d3af85c",
        • "change": "/api/projects/opc/environments/dev/changes/1978e9af-f1cc-4923-9157-20ad2d3af85c",
        • "log_lines": "/api/steps/98508e91-b9eb-4a35-bfdf-07fdb355e502/log_lines",
        • "self": "/api/steps/98508e91-b9eb-4a35-bfdf-07fdb355e502"
        },
      • "meta": { }
      }
    ]
}

Show step

Shows a change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 60edc3a2-2154-42e0-b1cc-cb6533cf8c0a

step id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "41c32c0f-4b81-404f-bb44-77191bce784b",

    • "attributes": {

      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,

      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:01:30.097096Z",

      • "status_code": "success"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "properties": {

        }
      }
    ]
}

Update step

Update a step to flag it to be skipped on retry.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 60edc3a2-2154-42e0-b1cc-cb6533cf8c0a

step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}

required
string

object

Reject step

path Parameters

required
string

step id

object

Responses

application/vnd.api+json

Log lines

Endpoints to query log lines for changes and individual change steps.

List change log lines

List the log lines for a change.

path Parameters
change_id
required
string
Example: 03911d3c-a2d4-4e41-9b3f-714f322531f7
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=change.log

Download the log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/changes/{change_id}/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "601c6e22-7993-4772-ad77-9923aedbae49",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Aut accusantium unde rerum.",
        • "change_id": "85a69124-64a0-4cae-8bbf-dc962c58205f",
        • "step_id": "704bf113-eb56-4d1f-b65c-c1c3d3f2fcb4",
        • "logged_at": "2025-11-02T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

List step log lines

List the log lines for a change step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 60edc3a2-2154-42e0-b1cc-cb6533cf8c0a
query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

download
string
Example: download=step.log

Download the log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/steps/{step_id}/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "c2780a36-ca6d-4ec1-b48c-49ddaaf5b8cb",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Dolore enim quia itaque.",
        • "change_id": "479986a8-47b5-42d5-8823-dc8df6b054f7",
        • "step_id": "e5f04aea-ecbd-48a0-84be-5522f345f4a1",
        • "logged_at": "2025-11-02T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

List filtered log lines

List filtered log lines.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[message_cont]=dolorem

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. null ]
Default: 10000
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of log lines returned

download
string
Example: download=opschain.log

Download the filtered log lines wth the specified file name. The logs will be ordered from oldest to newest when this parameter is specified, irrespective of the sort order requested.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/log_lines

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "80fe2a82-0c9d-4fdf-8b38-a5df93526ae5",
      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Voluptates quos reiciendis autem.",
        • "change_id": "4e6daa66-a7ac-4a9f-81c3-6303c8d19341",
        • "step_id": "9a433763-2e30-4293-86a3-c3377a5dbc91",
        • "logged_at": "2025-11-02T00:00:00.000000Z"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

      • "type": "log_line",
      • "attributes": {
        • "message": "Ea provident est enim.",
        • "workflow_run_id": "b1cdde02-dd60-419d-8fd7-7f73f7e825e8",

        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}

Workflow runs

Endpoints to interact with workflow runs

Notes:

  • The list and show endpoints are available via the following paths:
    1. /workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs accessible to the user.
    2. /project/{project_code}/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs for all this project's workflows.
    3. /project/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs this workflow.
    4. /<path/to/asset>/workflow_runs - will return all workflow runs that include a change for this asset.

List all workflow runs

Lists all workflow runs.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "e11b1307-2f9f-4ca7-b382-12c45c3cb42a",
      • "type": "workflow_run",
      • "attributes": {
        • "step_tree": {
          • "id": "4f3cf845-c9ea-4f85-b6f0-645ab6089183",
          • "name": "quia",
          • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
          • "children": [
            • {
              • "id": "c8422b51-eb69-4dea-9319-936474d4e78d",
              • "name": "officia",
              • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
              • "children": [
                • {
                  • "id": "6d82be8a-bc26-45cd-a430-479f45f61517",
                  • "name": "compress",
                  • "type": "workflow_change_step",
                  • "action": "compress",
                  • "target": "/projects/mgqlp/environments/pi8ul/assets/2gdxr"
                  }
                ],
              • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "3747654f-ad63-4b84-8dd3-8bbc0e36a08e",
              • "name": "override",
              • "type": "workflow_change_step",
              • "action": "override",
              • "target": "/projects/ynnqx/environments/jfyqa/assets/sxqhl"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "9f321bf8-ca0c-4798-a6f6-0cfd798d3765",
              • "name": "Wait",
              • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
              },
            • {
              • "id": "eb83347f-a523-410c-88e1-e18e839b015d",
              • "name": "child workflow",
              • "type": "workflow_workflow_step",
              • "target": "/projects/zuqgs/workflows/child"
              }
            ],
          • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
          },
        • "scheduled": false,
        • "metadata": {
          • "Temp": "0.5.8",
          • "Latlux": "5.8",
          • "Fix San": "0.7.1",
          • "Regrant": "0.68",
          • "Home Ing": "2.54",
          • "Tres-Zap": "9.2.5",
          • "Holdlamis": "8.1",
          • "Voyatouch": "0.15",
          • "Mat Lam Tam": "0.38",
          • "Solarbreeze": "0.56"
          },

}

Run a workflow

Runs a pre-defined workflow

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "project_code": "opc",
      • "workflow_code": "assets",
      • "version": 2,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "additional": "properties"
        },
      • "metadata": {
        • "optional": "metadata"
        }
      }
    }
}

  • 400
  • 422

Show workflow run

Shows a workflow run.

path Parameters
run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs/{run_id}

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json

Cancel workflow run

Cancels a workflow run.

path Parameters
run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find WorkflowRun with [WHERE \"workflow_version\".\"workflow_id\" IN (WITH \"user_authorisation_rules\" AS (select ar.path rule_path, ap.system, pa.username, pa.auth_provider, pa.groupname, bool_and(ar.readable) as readable, bool_and(ar.updatable) as updatable, bool_and(ar.executable) as executable from authorisation_rules ar inner join policy_rules pr on pr.authorisation_rule_id = ar.id inner join authorisation_policies ap on pr.authorisation_policy_id = ap.id inner join policy_assignments pa on pa.authorisation_policy_id = ap.id where ( (pa.username is null and pa.groupname is null) or (pa.username = 'delila.quigley') or (pa.groupname in ('ldap-group-1','ldap-group-2')) ) group by ar.path, ap.system, pa.username, pa.auth_provider, pa.groupname), \"wf_matching_rules\" AS (select w.id workflow_id, bool_and(ur.readable) over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as readable, bool_and(ur.updatable) over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as updatable, bool_and(ur.executable) over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as executable, rank() over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code order by ur.system desc, length(ur.rule_path) desc, ur.username nulls last, ur.groupname nulls last) ranking from workflows w inner join nodes n on w.node_id = n.id inner join user_authorisation_rules ur on ( (n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code || '/') ~ (ur.rule_path || '($|/)') or ('/workflows/' || w.code || '/') ~ (ur.rule_path || '($|/)') )) SELECT \"workflows\".\"id\" FROM \"workflows\" inner join wf_matching_rules mr on mr.workflow_id = workflows.id WHERE (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) ORDER BY LOWER(\"workflows\".\"name\") ASC) AND \"workflow_runs\".\"id\" = $1]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

List workflow runs (workflow specific)

Lists all runs for a workflow.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs

Run a workflow (workflow specific)

Runs a pre-defined workflow

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": 2,
      • "property_overrides": {
        • "additional": "properties"
        },
      • "metadata": {
        • "optional": "metadata"
        }
      }
    }
}

  • 201
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422

Show workflow run (workflow specific)

Shows a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "a1cb3c24-e616-4853-8ea7-79b1a4b62097",

Cancel workflow run (workflow specific)

Cancels a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}

Response samples

  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find WorkflowRun with [WHERE \"workflow_version\".\"workflow_id\" IN (WITH \"user_authorisation_rules\" AS (select ar.path rule_path, ap.system, pa.username, pa.auth_provider, pa.groupname, bool_and(ar.readable) as readable, bool_and(ar.updatable) as updatable, bool_and(ar.executable) as executable from authorisation_rules ar inner join policy_rules pr on pr.authorisation_rule_id = ar.id inner join authorisation_policies ap on pr.authorisation_policy_id = ap.id inner join policy_assignments pa on pa.authorisation_policy_id = ap.id where ( (pa.username is null and pa.groupname is null) or (pa.username = 'clair.boyer') or (pa.groupname in ('ldap-group-1','ldap-group-2')) ) group by ar.path, ap.system, pa.username, pa.auth_provider, pa.groupname), \"wf_matching_rules\" AS (select w.id workflow_id, bool_and(ur.readable) over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as readable, bool_and(ur.updatable) over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as updatable, bool_and(ur.executable) over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code, ur.username, ur.groupname, ur.system, ur.rule_path) as executable, rank() over (partition by n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code, '/workflows/' || w.code order by ur.system desc, length(ur.rule_path) desc, ur.username nulls last, ur.groupname nulls last) ranking from workflows w inner join nodes n on w.node_id = n.id inner join user_authorisation_rules ur on ( (n.path || '/workflows/' || w.code || '/') ~ (ur.rule_path || '($|/)') or ('/workflows/' || w.code || '/') ~ (ur.rule_path || '($|/)') )) SELECT \"workflows\".\"id\" FROM \"workflows\" inner join wf_matching_rules mr on mr.workflow_id = workflows.id WHERE (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) ORDER BY LOWER(\"workflows\".\"name\") ASC) AND \"parent\".\"code\" = $1 AND \"workflow\".\"code\" = $2 AND \"workflow_runs\".\"id\" = $3]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Workflow steps

Endpoints to interact with the steps in a workflow run

List all workflow steps

Lists all workflow steps.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps

application/vnd.api+json

        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:38.165762Z",
        • "action": "synthesize",
        • "property_overrides": {
          • "pixel": "copying"
          }
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "change": {
          • "data": null
          },
        • "change_parent": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "6a2a2113-15e6-4976-8b64-f71b5b9f069a",
            • "type": "asset"
            }
          },
        • "action_template_version": {
          • "data": {
            • "id": "b0d68d3e-cb4f-4d7c-9570-e69df79a1ad8",
            • "type": "template_version"
            }
          },
        • "workflow_run": {
          • "data": {

            • "type": "workflow_run"

        • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/e70cd875-f3b3-4dc9-8ac3-fdbb87336439/log_lines",

        • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/1552a0cf-55cd-4aed-b730-70bfdac14d5c"
        }

          • "data": null

Show a workflow step

Shows a workflow step.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: ba028028-6a11-4ee3-b7a0-1d4712dd6407

workflow step id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "0c310f86-d9ce-4282-828c-b2c492447b73",
    • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 1,
      • "created_by": "virgilio.denesik",
      • "name": "illum",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,

      },
    • "relationships": {

Update a workflow step

Update a workflow step to flag it to be skipped on retry.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: ba028028-6a11-4ee3-b7a0-1d4712dd6407

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "skip_on_retry": true
      }
    }
}

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {

Continue workflow step

Continues a "waiting" workflow step. To approve/reject a workflow step that needs approval see the approve workflow step API endpoint.

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 854a4ab5-25af-480e-9a7b-0c8d6d305347

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/continue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Done sanity checks. Ok to continue."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "ae9c2dbf-e534-4918-8491-67c66ef820fa",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "teena.robel",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "lock_version": 3,
      • "created_by": "benedict",
      • "name": "Wait",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "continued",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:06:12.403186Z",

      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:46.165520Z"

Approve workflow step

Approve a workflow step that requires approval. To continue a workflow step that does need approval see the continue workflow step API endpoint

path Parameters
step_id
required
string
Example: 854a4ab5-25af-480e-9a7b-0c8d6d305347

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/workflow_steps/{step_id}/approve

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422

string

List workflow steps (run specific)

Lists all steps in a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps

Response samples

  • 200
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "6ab2e4bc-7384-46c5-a75f-5c3046843a19",

Show workflow step (run specific)

Shows a step of a workflow run.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: ba028028-6a11-4ee3-b7a0-1d4712dd6407

workflow step id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "9350203b-c9e6-462c-84a7-b98f31f2b364",
    • "type": "workflow_noop_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "lock_version": 1,
      • "created_by": "daron",
      • "name": "et",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "success",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:01.794954Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-11-03T07:04:56.875284Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:10:58.172034Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:01.799751Z",
      • "child_execution_strategy": "sequential"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "35cebea3-982c-4e6e-926b-e58b825bce77",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "b741baa0-2f58-43d5-b72c-5fbdc2c59037",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "0d60d2ba-2df5-48a5-9409-094cad9cd1c9",
            • "type": "workflow_noop_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "442d2b9d-1f8e-455e-aa0d-03c227e9dc90",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "1e318a56-c5d0-4e29-8f21-37ae20045f0c",
            • "type": "workflow_wait_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "8b1e3f2d-6cce-4ee9-9345-61cc960b21c5",
            • "type": "workflow_workflow_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "ebd4d474-e20a-476c-8a6f-1db254c67518",
            • "type": "workflow_change_step"
            },
          • {
            • "id": "d18fba5c-d954-4d8c-ae3c-8e3853794802",
            • "type": "workflow_workflow_step"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/35cebea3-982c-4e6e-926b-e58b825bce77/steps/9350203b-c9e6-462c-84a7-b98f31f2b364",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/9350203b-c9e6-462c-84a7-b98f31f2b364/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/35cebea3-982c-4e6e-926b-e58b825bce77",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/35cebea3-982c-4e6e-926b-e58b825bce77"
      }
    }
}

Continue workflow step (run specific)

Continues a "waiting" workflow step. To approve/reject a workflow step that needs approval see the approve workflow step API endpoint.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 854a4ab5-25af-480e-9a7b-0c8d6d305347

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/continue

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Done sanity checks. Ok to continue."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "61d01966-01a2-4164-944b-e3edcb382d2b",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "sharilyn",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "requires_approval_from": null,
      • "lock_version": 3,
      • "created_by": "renetta",
      • "name": "Wait",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "continued",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:03:22.421485Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-11-03T07:04:22.421485Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:06.914238Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:06.933053Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "0c5543f8-7cd8-435c-85f0-4a9bbe13f18f",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/0c5543f8-7cd8-435c-85f0-4a9bbe13f18f/steps/61d01966-01a2-4164-944b-e3edcb382d2b",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/61d01966-01a2-4164-944b-e3edcb382d2b/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/0c5543f8-7cd8-435c-85f0-4a9bbe13f18f/steps/8b801226-f5e0-45d5-97e4-f6a9359de7c9",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/0c5543f8-7cd8-435c-85f0-4a9bbe13f18f"
      }
    }
}

Approve workflow step (run specific)

Approve a workflow step that requires approval. To continue a workflow step that does need approval see the continue workflow step API endpoint

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 854a4ab5-25af-480e-9a7b-0c8d6d305347

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/approve

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "1e7635aa-f478-4e44-a358-49d58b03fbd8",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "denis.borer",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "rejected_by": [ ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": "an-ldap-group",
      • "lock_version": 3,
      • "created_by": "brad",
      • "name": "Approval",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "approved",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:05:19.568603Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-11-03T07:06:19.568603Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:10.555279Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:10.587815Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {
        • "data": {
          • "id": "ab90fded-e49b-4f54-8262-67cfd3379012",
          • "type": "workflow_run"
          }
        },
      • "children": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/ab90fded-e49b-4f54-8262-67cfd3379012/steps/1e7635aa-f478-4e44-a358-49d58b03fbd8",
      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/1e7635aa-f478-4e44-a358-49d58b03fbd8/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/ab90fded-e49b-4f54-8262-67cfd3379012/steps/d17778d5-085b-43e3-b58d-0c176421d8b0",
      • "workflow_run": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/ab90fded-e49b-4f54-8262-67cfd3379012"
      }
    }
}

Reject workflow step (run specific)

Reject a workflow step that requires approval.

path Parameters
project_code
required
string
Example: opc

project code

workflow_code
required
string
Example: assets

workflow code

run_id
required
string
Example: f172bec4-3ff9-4e2f-83d5-745e1ec9c2b0

workflow run id

step_id
required
string
Example: 854a4ab5-25af-480e-9a7b-0c8d6d305347

workflow step id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/projects/{project_code}/workflows/{workflow_code}/runs/{run_id}/steps/{step_id}/reject

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "message": "Ok to proceed."
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 403
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "5735eb61-76da-40a0-8021-7d31abcaf01d",
    • "type": "workflow_wait_step",
    • "attributes": {
      • "approved_by": [ ],
      • "rejected_by": [
        • {
          • "username": "micheal_hartmann",
          • "message": null
          }
        ],
      • "continued_by": [ ],
      • "requires_approval_from": "an-ldap-group",
      • "lock_version": 3,
      • "created_by": "dario",
      • "name": "Approval",
      • "skip_on_retry": false,
      • "notifications": { },
      • "status_code": "rejected",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:06:40.994752Z",
      • "started_at": "2025-11-03T07:07:40.994752Z",
      • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:15.984140Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:13:15.988232Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "workflow_run": {

      • "log_lines": "/api/workflow_steps/5735eb61-76da-40a0-8021-7d31abcaf01d/log_lines",
      • "parent": "/api/projects/opc/workflows/assets/runs/f415a949-04e4-4d45-ac7b-917373adb7eb/steps/ffdfb70d-0bcc-40aa-978b-cd18db463c16",

Events

Endpoints to interact with events.

List events

Lists all events.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[query_param_code_eq]=opc

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 10
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of events returned

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/events

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "e116bee9-19a9-4570-a9e8-e363ab6e34e3",
      • "type": "event",
      • "attributes": {
        • "nested": {
          • "key": "nested value"
          },
        • "any_key": "with a value",
        • "another_key": "with a different value",
        • "username": "felisha_jerde",
        • "system": false,
        • "type": "my custom event",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:23.143664Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "source": {
          • "links": {
            • "source": "/api/projects/opc"
            },
          • "data": {
            • "id": "556c55f7-710d-45da-adfd-099655fdf207",
            • "type": "project"
            }
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/events/e116bee9-19a9-4570-a9e8-e363ab6e34e3"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false
    }
}
