Jobs

Endpoint to fetch information about the jobs processed by the OpsChain.

Get information about the jobs that are being processed by the OpsChain

Returns information about the jobs that are being processed by the OpsChain.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[status_eq]=finished

API filtering guide

limit
integer [ 1 .. 1000 ]
Default: 100
Example: limit=50

Limit the number of jobs returned

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/jobs

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "844537",
      • "type": "job",
      • "attributes": {
        • "priority": 33,
        • "job_class": "ChangeJob",
        • "error_count": 0,
        • "last_error_message": null,
        • "queue": "default",
        • "last_error_backtrace": null,
        • "args": "\"[]\"",
        • "data": "\"{}\"",
        • "kwargs": "\"{}\"",
        • "maximum_retry_count": 0,
        • "node_id": "6d4072ae-6eee-42dd-bc6a-154e6cac2e29",
        • "node_path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
        • "status": "finished",
        • "description": "Verifies if a change can be started based on its owner configuration and, if so, starts it.",
        • "run_at": "2025-11-02T15:56:40.346025Z",
        • "finished_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:31.634582Z",
        • "expired_at": null
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "partial_response": false,
    • "has_any": true,
    • "total_matching_filter": 1
    }
}

required
string
Example: 8f7c8fe2-3083-4333-88fe-8eb47a028431

settings id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/settings/{settings_id}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "ebb977ba-cc8e-4de9-b05e-2cdd12b5f6ce",
    • "type": "settings",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
        • "repo_folder": ".opschain"
        },
      • "version": 1,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:50.316376Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/settings/ebb977ba-cc8e-4de9-b05e-2cdd12b5f6ce",
      • "current_version": "/api/settings/ebb977ba-cc8e-4de9-b05e-2cdd12b5f6ce/versions/1",
      • "versions": "/api/settings/ebb977ba-cc8e-4de9-b05e-2cdd12b5f6ce/versions"
      }
    }
}

Update settings

Updates a settings JSON if the included version matches the current settings version.

path Parameters
id_to_update
required
string
Example: 8f7c8fe2-3083-4333-88fe-8eb47a028431

settings id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/settings/{id_to_update}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
        • "repo_folder": ".opschain",
        • "notifications": {
          • "channels": [
            • {
              • "name": "slack-1",
              • "type": "slack",
              • "token": "slack-token"
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "version": 1
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7885fb58-cfb2-4a6b-bfca-049741e2ca57",
    • "type": "settings",
    • "attributes": {
      • "data": {
        • "requires_approval_from": "opschain",
        • "repo_folder": ".opschain",
        • "notifications": {
          • "channels": [
            • {
              • "name": "slack-1",
              • "type": "slack",
              • "token": "{AES2}ndB8dBsPmkZuoS7VVpE4Hg=={/IV}UGLb8vuprDzd6QxxjDbmHhw=="
              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "version": 2,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:50.694494Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "owner": {
        • "links": {
          • "owner": "/api/projects/opc"
          }
        }

filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0b7feff9-5a68-44dc-a401-11da2e4b6069",

      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "Allow read on all",
        • "path": "",
        • "readable": true,
        • "updatable": true,
        • "executable": true,
        • "created_by": "test",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:03.419474Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:03.419474Z"

      • "relationships": {
        • "authorisation_policies": {
          • "data": [

              }
            ]
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/0b7feff9-5a68-44dc-a401-11da2e4b6069"
        }

      • "type": "authorisation_rule",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "Deny access to Project asset",
        • "path": "^/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
        • "readable": false,
        • "updatable": false,
        • "executable": false,

              }

    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }

Create rule

Create an authorisation rule.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "path": "^/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "name": "Deny access to Project asset"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "df2a7f6f-b63a-457d-b694-61ea7990d503",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "back up",
      • "path": "^/projects/exiqr/environments/uakmc",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "created_by": "myrna",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:04.103951Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:04.103951Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/df2a7f6f-b63a-457d-b694-61ea7990d503"
      }
    }
}

Show rule

path Parameters
authorisation_rule_id
required
string
Example: 06d280ad-a345-4662-b9f6-3e0a431ca2da

authorisation rule id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules/{authorisation_rule_id}

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{

    • "id": "4a558a04-d1e6-4f32-b051-ed75ba3abee3",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Deny access to Development",
      • "path": "^/projects/opc/environments/dev",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,

path Parameters
authorisation_rule_id
required
string
Example: 06d280ad-a345-4662-b9f6-3e0a431ca2da

authorisation rule id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_rules/{authorisation_rule_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "path": "/projects/demo/environments/dev",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "name": "Deny all on dev environment"
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "607a1140-8be9-48c9-81fa-74d013dce115",
    • "type": "authorisation_rule",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Deny all on dev environment",
      • "path": "^/projects/demo/environments/dev",
      • "readable": false,
      • "updatable": false,
      • "executable": false,
      • "created_by": "arturo.willms",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:05.548426Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:05.604150Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "authorisation_policies": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "cd0aa0ec-c23a-4345-adc6-d71afea9caf0",
            • "type": "authorisation_policy"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_rules/607a1140-8be9-48c9-81fa-74d013dce115"
      }
    }
}

path Parameters
authorisation_rule_id
required
string
Example: 06d280ad-a345-4662-b9f6-3e0a431ca2da

Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find AuthorisationRule with 'id'=abc"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Authorisation policies

Endpoints to interact with authorisation policies.

List policies

Lists all authorisation policies.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=secure

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "f9179ab5-12a4-480d-9cc0-d7d1560d056a",
      • "type": "authorisation_policy",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "Sample policy",
        • "description": null,
        • "system": false,
        • "created_by": "test",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:10:59.346210Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:10:59.346210Z"
        },
      • "relationships": {
        • "policy_rules": {
          • "data": [
            • {

Create policy

Create an authorisation policy with a list of authorisation rules.

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "anneliese.durgan",
      • "description": "Adipisci quo enim corporis.",
      • "authorisation_rules": [
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          },
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "200316c0-8023-4834-abde-2413fa45a6ae",
    • "type": "authorisation_policy",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "jo_marvin",
      • "description": "Praesentium est voluptate nesciunt.",
      • "system": false,
      • "created_by": "micheal.stiedemann",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:00.351541Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:00.351541Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "policy_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "policy_assignments": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "authorisation_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_policies/200316c0-8023-4834-abde-2413fa45a6ae",
      • "policy_rules": "/api/authorisation_policies/200316c0-8023-4834-abde-2413fa45a6ae/rules",
      • "policy_assignments": "/api/authorisation_policies/200316c0-8023-4834-abde-2413fa45a6ae/assignments"
      }
    }

Update authorisation policy and its rules

Update an authorisation policy and its authorisation rules. If no authorisation rules are provided, all associated rules will be removed from the policy.

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: ea62e267-390e-4532-8dee-b00e02388957

authorisation policy id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "bud.hansen",
      • "description": "Nihil aliquid reiciendis ipsum.",
      • "authorisation_rules": [
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          },
        • {
          • "path": "/projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "readable": false,
          • "updatable": false,
          • "executable": false
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "7ea41fd2-fadf-43e6-945f-107cf42fa137",
    • "type": "authorisation_policy",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Updated policy name",
      • "description": "Access for all incoming users",
      • "system": false,
      • "created_by": "belva_herzog",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:01.864527Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:01.921709Z"
      },
    • "relationships": {
      • "policy_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        },
      • "policy_assignments": {
        • "data": [
          • {
            • "id": "b5cf4702-487a-4761-ae9c-7d7fc6a76fcd",
            • "type": "policy_assignment"
            }
          ]
        },
      • "authorisation_rules": {
        • "data": [ ]
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/authorisation_policies/7ea41fd2-fadf-43e6-945f-107cf42fa137",
      • "policy_rules": "/api/authorisation_policies/7ea41fd2-fadf-43e6-945f-107cf42fa137/rules",
      • "policy_assignments": "/api/authorisation_policies/7ea41fd2-fadf-43e6-945f-107cf42fa137/assignments"
      }
    }

application/vnd.api+json

        }
      }
    ]
}

Delete a policy rule

Remove an authorisation rule from a specific authorisation policy.

path Parameters
authorisation_policy_id
required
string
Example: ea62e267-390e-4532-8dee-b00e02388957

authorisation policy id

policy_rule_id
required
string
Example: 519d370f-cb67-4da8-8d9f-07b1dff85f03

policy rule id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/authorisation_policies/{authorisation_policy_id}/rules/{policy_rule_id}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find PolicyRule with 'id'=abc"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Users

Endpoints to interact with the users in the system.

List users

Lists users in the system

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/users

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "f6cce6d4-8a0f-40db-9d5f-775168937c0f",
      • "type": "user",
      • "attributes": {
        • "username": "alvin",
        • "groupnames": [
          • "ldap-group-1",
          • "ldap-group-2"
          ],
        • "auth_provider": "ldap",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:10.719728Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:10.719728Z"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Groups

Endpoints to interact with the user LDAP groups.

Secrets

Endpoints to interact with secrets from the vault or decrypting AES encrypted strings.

Resolve secrets

Returns the decrypted values of the supplied secrets

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/secrets

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "owner_type": "settings",
      • "owner_id": "366c2f06-a3fa-4b18-af55-7602a753f32d",
      • "mintmodel_owner_path": "/projects/opc/assets/prj_soa",
      • "converge_date": "2025-11-03T07:10:52.886330Z",
      • "values_to_decrypt": [
        • "secret-vault://csh/infrastructure/files/oci_platform_configs.yaml",
        • "{AES2}TdxBDw3KtDj+FKKckKeF5A=={/IV}Ud/ubLWIwhpCwkgBa6DSd5A=="
        ]
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 422
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "secrets",
    • "type": "secrets",
    • "attributes": {
      • "results": [
        • {
          • "source": "secret-vault://csh/infrastructure/files/oci_platform_configs.yaml",
          • "result": "ERROR: You do not have permission to resolve settings secrets for /projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "filename": null
          },
        • {
          • "source": "secret-vault://csh/infrastructure/sshkeys/oci_new_key",
          • "result": "ERROR: You do not have permission to resolve settings secrets for /projects/opc/environments/dev",
          • "filename": null
          }
        ]
      }
    }
}

Info

Get version and other information about the running OpsChain instance.

Get OpsChain server info

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/info

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "0",
    • "type": "info",
    • "attributes": {
      • "version": "edge",
      • "runner_image": "limepoint/opschain-runner-enterprise:edge",
      • "db_version": "17.2",
      • "api_version": "7.1.5.1",
      • "ldap_available?": true,
      • "banners": [ ],
      • "instance_info": { },
      • "licence_info": {
        • "licence_issuer": "LimePoint Pty Ltd",
        • "licence_issuer_contact": "support@limepoint.com",
        • "licence_version": "1",
        • "customer_identifier": "Engineering",
        • "start_date": "2025-09-14T00:00:00Z",
        • "end_date": "2026-09-14T00:00:00Z"
        }
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/info"
      },
    • "meta": {
      • "authorisations": {
        • "secrets": {
          • "global_decrypt": false,
          • "global_encrypt": false
          }
        }
      }
    }
}

Trust store

Endpoint to manage the trust store and certificates.

List certificates

Lists certificates in the trust store.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/trust_store

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "ca_self.pem",
      • "type": "certificate",
      • "attributes": {
        • "filename": "ca_self.pem",
        • "content": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIFQzCCAyugAwIBAgIUeNS0f9lqaJhC2apc91FbPRBVPNwwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEL\nBQAwMTEQMA4GA1UEAwwHUm9vdCBDQTEdMBsGA1UECgwUTGltZVBvaW50RW5naW5l\nZXJpbmcwHhcNMjUwNDI5MDA0NzAxWhcNMzAwNDI5MDA0NzAxWjAxMRAwDgYDVQQD\nDAdSb290IENBMR0wGwYDVQQKDBRMaW1lUG9pbnRFbmdpbmVlcmluZzCCAiIwDQYJ\nKoZIhvcNAQEBBQADggIPADCCAgoCggIBAJoUxJkyK3VKbBhVwQPRmA9MqUOocn16\nSOZm5KVPVyR2F9OZ4xIyZTkUalUFGrguoDAyvKAI+AgGRhNJG+kKQ7PLAAEbSWBE\ngdXNNtSAj4Yvo0Bw3XbxqZM7kBO7GfysKMjqKsEeR0wiwshAQPsBjAYa78ayDRC5\nRqN1jR9al65UdLcE5yDbbpMd7GwR3b9ythahsox8PfHL60sZf7NfI4q+SkgbOVzt\ndxppCZqwZRuMVWdvvQk069UkOYoRXniQEIFU6Ugd8FWIIzleHyKEodTsRhhXUjBS\nGbA3v+x66mS87r6bE6ffFwLO0reFgfx4a7dMmhd5djrOfZtZ0L8zizXwsyee5j6v\niNokciyLHgRfWYHsYZ3OgHC8p7i02Xd9vcCsaPuoGopo0G/+wog289ObTqGbxu28\nX8Bk5/kIVkn79LDA4zWz7VwYY0uoK0TxWpdMg2yuvE5nH94qGlnJisopxVhrZ7qH\nE+QEqUYhelJNCi62Z8gmT0z3d7lmsq9gH23o1Zngdhnygdrm3rh404bjK/xFL6Hf\n0YmiYhQw8ydHKGWY8rfhjL8eXl1gURZTqLTZC6J3sF3SAS1hj2nrePsPGt7S1OqI\ndjd/vGLSLz/SGyE9d5sOeTvza9pmKKXKqcvPFbwgF496dZmAu6xtVC+6pa8hOXJW\nYlC0xn/xXnTFAgMBAAGjUzBRMB0GA1UdDgQWBBRdN8nNGCxpxe0zHXz3BrrtlYvV\nLjAfBgNVHSMEGDAWgBRdN8nNGCxpxe0zHXz3BrrtlYvVLjAPBgNVHRMBAf8EBTAD\nAQH/MA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAA4ICAQB6jtlLzWd6yjbye2SsB04ns6B6WskdOAkk\npjGz7MyARCEvgfHh5HtMzBi9l5mxXjMfYuQx3ag75lTSaA/OUgGCQOQygwD6qUXX\nQKslqCh1EEbNfDUuBt31OhAFECkKl194euhuIjUugyL+D07Oscg+k77WDEesBif0\nR8ei+j+AX/sK4RFacFMgAAWHaI3chGu2qrnFHoKEB/R9OUieEb6c8CbVEXyOzCbW\nxerP1sxPBuqvw5/UMwdafXlVmPfC/7C1dJzdw5/yAE6gwEB0ztaaEMsA22smd8dk\nNDugbmY9yTLRWFN2XIs9jgCaDM0hZOFDPbxkX7oD30z3FVkbuSII3EK0GAqHYy15\nZLD5xaxolyKOvQwXYoHVJD95KX1OVuNcILsd2iVGAKpI8IWOu2A1Kvq/Kr5qtxRW\nhcP+nL5XVu/mGP/GABI/zggORdjfAezb9mWi2ozfmSHyJsN8qfVOvK4urDj2YdbR\ntMybK+X7KpN947oZQwJ8WgfO3mTt4jkYPEFgUyVDFRuMcx25ewxy/5+HcpZvgmKd\nesPTYnR/q+kdQ+IO2OrOoBGUJ8F7bmiAKVThBWZKUn9jGAym+A4CEMrklCYwqZT5\nAuA0rI1AjitrP74YqylXtmP2IUJkxCOXBthnlt1oC2UPYXyACPdp5K4+KZbK/63B\nWbrO/ELdag==\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n",
        • "description": "Main CA cert.",
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:09.820733Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:09.820733Z"
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/trust_store/ca_self.pem"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

Create certificate

Creates a certificate in the trust store.

Request Body schema: multipart/form-data
description
string
file
string <binary>

certificate file, the uploaded file's filename is used to name the new certificate

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/trust_store

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
multipart/form-data
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="description"

New certificate description
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="remote_system.crt"
content-type: application/x-x509-ca-cert
content-length: 1887

Show certificate

Shows a certificate from the trust store.

path Parameters
certificate_filename
required
string
Example: ca_self.pem

certificate filename

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/trust_store/{certificate_filename}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "ca_self.pem",
    • "type": "certificate",
    • "attributes": {
      • "filename": "ca_self.pem",
      • "content": "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIFQzCCAyugAwIBAgIUeNS0f9lqaJhC2apc91FbPRBVPNwwDQYJKoZIhvcNAQEL\nBQAwMTEQMA4GA1UEAwwHUm9vdCBDQTEdMBsGA1UECgwUTGltZVBvaW50RW5naW5l\nZXJpbmcwHhcNMjUwNDI5MDA0NzAxWhcNMzAwNDI5MDA0NzAxWjAxMRAwDgYDVQQD\nDAdSb290IENBMR0wGwYDVQQKDBRMaW1lUG9pbnRFbmdpbmVlcmluZzCCAiIwDQYJ\nKoZIhvcNAQEBBQADggIPADCCAgoCggIBAJoUxJkyK3VKbBhVwQPRmA9MqUOocn16\nSOZm5KVPVyR2F9OZ4xIyZTkUalUFGrguoDAyvKAI+AgGRhNJG+kKQ7PLAAEbSWBE\ngdXNNtSAj4Yvo0Bw3XbxqZM7kBO7GfysKMjqKsEeR0wiwshAQPsBjAYa78ayDRC5\nRqN1jR9al65UdLcE5yDbbpMd7GwR3b9ythahsox8PfHL60sZf7NfI4q+SkgbOVzt\ndxppCZqwZRuMVWdvvQk069UkOYoRXniQEIFU6Ugd8FWIIzleHyKEodTsRhhXUjBS\nGbA3v+x66mS87r6bE6ffFwLO0reFgfx4a7dMmhd5djrOfZtZ0L8zizXwsyee5j6v\niNokciyLHgRfWYHsYZ3OgHC8p7i02Xd9vcCsaPuoGopo0G/+wog289ObTqGbxu28\nX8Bk5/kIVkn79LDA4zWz7VwYY0uoK0TxWpdMg2yuvE5nH94qGlnJisopxVhrZ7qH\nE+QEqUYhelJNCi62Z8gmT0z3d7lmsq9gH23o1Zngdhnygdrm3rh404bjK/xFL6Hf\n0YmiYhQw8ydHKGWY8rfhjL8eXl1gURZTqLTZC6J3sF3SAS1hj2nrePsPGt7S1OqI\ndjd/vGLSLz/SGyE9d5sOeTvza9pmKKXKqcvPFbwgF496dZmAu6xtVC+6pa8hOXJW\nYlC0xn/xXnTFAgMBAAGjUzBRMB0GA1UdDgQWBBRdN8nNGCxpxe0zHXz3BrrtlYvV\nLjAfBgNVHSMEGDAWgBRdN8nNGCxpxe0zHXz3BrrtlYvVLjAPBgNVHRMBAf8EBTAD\nAQH/MA0GCSqGSIb3DQEBCwUAA4ICAQB6jtlLzWd6yjbye2SsB04ns6B6WskdOAkk\npjGz7MyARCEvgfHh5HtMzBi9l5mxXjMfYuQx3ag75lTSaA/OUgGCQOQygwD6qUXX\nQKslqCh1EEbNfDUuBt31OhAFECkKl194euhuIjUugyL+D07Oscg+k77WDEesBif0\nR8ei+j+AX/sK4RFacFMgAAWHaI3chGu2qrnFHoKEB/R9OUieEb6c8CbVEXyOzCbW\nxerP1sxPBuqvw5/UMwdafXlVmPfC/7C1dJzdw5/yAE6gwEB0ztaaEMsA22smd8dk\nNDugbmY9yTLRWFN2XIs9jgCaDM0hZOFDPbxkX7oD30z3FVkbuSII3EK0GAqHYy15\nZLD5xaxolyKOvQwXYoHVJD95KX1OVuNcILsd2iVGAKpI8IWOu2A1Kvq/Kr5qtxRW\nhcP+nL5XVu/mGP/GABI/zggORdjfAezb9mWi2ozfmSHyJsN8qfVOvK4urDj2YdbR\ntMybK+X7KpN947oZQwJ8WgfO3mTt4jkYPEFgUyVDFRuMcx25ewxy/5+HcpZvgmKd\nesPTYnR/q+kdQ+IO2OrOoBGUJ8F7bmiAKVThBWZKUn9jGAym+A4CEMrklCYwqZT5\nAuA0rI1AjitrP74YqylXtmP2IUJkxCOXBthnlt1oC2UPYXyACPdp5K4+KZbK/63B\nWbrO/ELdag==\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----\n",
      • "description": "Main CA cert.",
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:10.045973Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:12:10.045973Z"
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/trust_store/ca_self.pem"
      }
    }
}

Delete certificate

Delete certificate from the trust store.

path Parameters
certificate_filename
required
string
Example: ca_self.pem

certificate filename

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/trust_store/{certificate_filename}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find Certificate with [WHERE (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) AND \"certificates\".\"filename\" = $1]"
        }
      }
    ]
}

Update certificate

Updates a certificate in the trust store.

path Parameters
certificate_filename
required
string
Example: ca_self.pem

certificate filename

Request Body schema: multipart/form-data
description
string
file
string <binary>

certificate file (the filename is ignored)

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/trust_store/{certificate_filename}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
multipart/form-data
------------XnJLe9ZIbbGUYtzPQJ16u1
content-disposition: form-data; name="description"

Updated certificate description

content-disposition: form-data; name="file"; filename="remote_system.crt"
content-type: application/x-x509-ca-cert
content-length: 1887

System configuration

Endpoint to fetch the current system configuration.

Updates the system licence.

Request Body schema: multipart/form-data
licence
string

Responses

multipart/form-data

content-length: 924

Get OpsChain system configuration

Shows the current system configuration node.

query Parameters
include
string
Example: include=settings

Include the settings in the response

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/system_configuration

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{

    • "id": "aafcc01b-740b-4c8a-ab54-88819404c121",
    • "type": "system_configuration",
    • "attributes": {
      • "code": "system",

Admin operations

Endpoints to monitor the status of your OpsChain instance.

Get status information about the OpsChain database

Returns status information about the OpsChain database.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/admin/database

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "0",
      • "type": "database_status",
      • "attributes": {
        • "version": "17.2",
        • "uptime": 857,
        • "database_size": "11 MB",
        • "events_table_size": "48 kB",
        • "log_lines_table_size": "40 kB",
        • "connections": {
          • "active": 1,
          • "idle": 1,
          • "max_configured": 100
          },
        • "pod": {
          • "name": "opschain-db-pod",
          • "namespace": "opschain",
          • "node": "node1",
          • "host_ip": "192.168.1.1",
          • "pod_ip": "192.168.1.2",
          • "start_time": "2021-01-01",
          • "state": "Running",
          • "image": "opschain-db-image",
          • "restart_count": 0,
          • "pvc_name": "opschain-db-claim"
          }
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/admin/database"
        }
      }
    ]
}

            }

}

Get the status of the OpsChain queues

Returns the status of the OpsChain queues and details about their jobs.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/admin/queues

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "default",
      • "type": "queue_status",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "default",
        • "summary": {
          • "total": 10,
          • "running": 2,
          • "failed": 1,
          • "scheduled": 3,
          • "finished": 4,
          • "pending": 1
          },
        • "jobs": [
          • {
            • "job_class": "ChangeJob",
            • "total": 5,
            • "running": 1,
            • "failed": 1,
            • "scheduled": 2,
            • "finished": 3,
            • "pending": 0,
            • "next_run_at": "2025-11-03T19:10:59.033+11:00",
            • "last_run_at": "2025-11-03T17:10:59.033+11:00",
            • "highest_error_count": 2,
            • "description": "Verifies if a change can be started based on its owner configuration and, if so, starts it."
            },
          • {
            • "job_class": "DataCleanupJob",
            • "total": 5,
            • "running": 0,
            • "failed": 0,
            • "scheduled": 0,
            • "finished": 0,
            • "pending": 0,
            • "next_run_at": "2025-11-03T19:10:59.033+11:00",
            • "last_run_at": "2025-11-03T16:10:59.033+11:00",
            • "highest_error_count": 0,
            • "description": "Cleans up data based on a data cleanup definition."
            }
          ]
        }
      }
    ]
}

Get the status of the OpsChain API workers

Returns the status of all the OpsChain API workers in the configured namespace.

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/admin/workers

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "opschain-api-worker-1",
      • "type": "worker",
      • "attributes": {
        • "namespace": "opschain",
        • "node": "node-1",
        • "host_ip": "192.168.1.1",
        • "pod_ip": "192.168.1.2",
        • "start_time": "2021-01-01T00:00:00Z",
        • "state": "Running",
        • "image": "opschain-api-worker-image",
        • "restart_count": 0
        }
      }
    ]
}

Data cleanup definitions

Endpoints to interact with data cleanup definitions.

List data cleanup definitions

Lists all data cleanup definitions.

query Parameters
filter[<query/sort filter>]=
string
Example: filter[<query/sort filter>]==> filter[name_eq]=test

API filtering guide

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions

Response samples

  • 200
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": [
    • {
      • "id": "428c0985-31f2-486e-b313-152d612652e3",
      • "type": "data_cleanup_definition",
      • "attributes": {
        • "name": "panel",
        • "enabled": true,
        • "created_by": "audria",
        • "cron_schedule": "0 0 7,14,21,28 * *",
        • "repeat": true,
        • "maximum_run_count": null,
        • "purge_activities": false,
        • "purge_events": false,
        • "purge_jobs": false,
        • "filters": {
          • "changes": {
            • "created_at_lt": "2025-10-27T07:11:20.942Z"
            }
          },
        • "node_paths": [
          • "/projects/opc/environments/dev"
          ],
        • "run_count": 0,
        • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:20.945354Z",
        • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:20.945354Z",
        • "next_run_at": "2025-11-06T13:00:00.000000Z",
        • "run_at": null,
        • "end_at": null
        },
      • "links": {
        • "self": "/api/data_cleanup_definitions/428c0985-31f2-486e-b313-152d612652e3"
        }
      }
    ],
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      },
    • "has_any": true
    }
}

Create data cleanup definition

Notes:

  1. See the various payload examples to understand the required fields for each possible request to this endpoint.
  2. Either the cron_schedule or run_at fields must be provided.
  3. The keys accepted for the filters field are changes, events, jobs, and workflow_runs. Each of these can have ransack filters for the specific type they refer to. IMPORTANT: If no filters are provided for a data type, the cleanup will remove all data that matches the node paths.
  4. The node_paths field is an array of strings. Each string is a path to a node. The path must start with /projects and only contain forward slashes, lowercase letters, numbers and underscores, and optionally a single "%" at the end. Use the % wildcard to include all nodes under a specific node or node-type, note that this will apply the cleanup to all nodes that are yet to be created, as long as they match the path.
Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "Will run once at 1am on 1st January 2020",
      • "enabled": true,
      • "node_paths": [ ],
      • "filters": { },
      • "purge_activities": false,
      • "purge_events": true,
      • "purge_jobs": true,
      • "cron_schedule": "30 9 14 5 4",
      • "run_at": "2020-01-01 01:00:00 UTC",
      • "end_at": null,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "repeat": false
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 201
  • 400
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {
    • "id": "5d447073-44af-4f39-a9d9-f0e4475966f5",
    • "type": "data_cleanup_definition",
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "bus",
      • "enabled": true,
      • "created_by": "madie_willms",
      • "cron_schedule": "39 21 14 5 0",
      • "repeat": true,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "purge_activities": true,
      • "purge_events": true,
      • "purge_jobs": true,
      • "filters": { },
      • "node_paths": [ ],
      • "run_count": 0,
      • "created_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:21.229442Z",
      • "updated_at": "2025-11-03T07:11:21.229442Z",
      • "next_run_at": "2026-05-03T11:39:00.000000Z",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null
      },
    • "links": {
      • "self": "/api/data_cleanup_definitions/5d447073-44af-4f39-a9d9-f0e4475966f5"
      }
    },
  • "meta": {
    • "authorisations": {
      • "update": true
      }
    }
}

required
string

Update the data cleanup definition

Updates a data cleanup definition.

Notes:

  1. See the various payload examples in the create endpoint to understand the attributes you can supply to this endpoint.
  2. The payload need only consist of the attributes you wish to modify. There is no need to supply the entire data cleanup definition.
path Parameters
data_cleanup_definition_id
required
string
Example: d7608d49-135f-4aee-af5f-a6a1393428d6

data cleanup definition id

Request Body schema: application/vnd.api+json
required
object

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions/{data_cleanup_definition_id}

Request samples

  • Payload
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
Example
{
  • "data": {
    • "attributes": {
      • "name": "new_name",
      • "enabled": true,
      • "node_paths": [ ],
      • "filters": { },
      • "purge_activities": true,
      • "purge_events": false,
      • "purge_jobs": true,
      • "cron_schedule": "18 20 21 11 1",
      • "run_at": null,
      • "end_at": null,
      • "maximum_run_count": null,
      • "repeat": true
      }
    }
}

Response samples

  • 200
  • 400
  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "data": {

    • "type": "data_cleanup_definition",

      • "name": "new_name",
      • "enabled": true,

Delete the data cleanup definition

Delete a data cleanup definition.

path Parameters
data_cleanup_definition_id
required
string
Example: d7608d49-135f-4aee-af5f-a6a1393428d6

data cleanup definition id

Responses

https://{defaultHost}/api/data_cleanup_definitions/{data_cleanup_definition_id}

Response samples

  • 404
Content type
application/vnd.api+json
{
  • "errors": [
    • {
      • "status": 404,
      • "title": "Active Record - Record Not Found",
      • "meta": {
        • "message": "Couldn't find DataCleanupDefinition with [WHERE (mr.ranking = 1 and mr.readable = true) AND \"data_cleanup_definitions\".\"id\" = $1]"
        }
      }
    ]
}
